category-baking.name: Baking
category-baking.comment: Products used in baking like flour, sugar, baking powder.

category-cheese.name: Cheese
category-cheese.comment: Different kinds of cheeses such as parmigiano, mozzarella, or cheddar. Also includes grated cheeses.

category-bakery.name: Bakery
category-bakery.comment: Baked goods such as bread, toast, muffins.

category-frozen.name: Frozen
category-frozen.comment: All frozen food including pre-made and ice cream.

category-canned.name: Canned
category-canned.comment: All canned foods including vegetables, fruits and pre-made foods.

category-sweets.name: Sweets
category-sweets.comment: All kinds of sweets, biscuits, chocolate, ...

category-oil-vinegar.name: Oil and Vinegar
category-oil-vinegar.comment: Includes all the different types of oils and vinegars.

category-coffee.name: Coffee and Tea
category-coffee.comment: All kinds of coffee and tea products

category-meat.name: Meat
category-meat.comment: Fresh meat such as ground beef, steak, chicken.

category-condiments-sauces.name: Condiments and Sauces
category-condiments-sauces.comment: All condiments such as ketchup, mayo, mustard. Also includes sauces such as pesto rosso.

category-cereal.name: Cereal
category-cereal.comment: All types of cereal including müsli and oatmeal.

category-alcohol.name: Alcohol
category-alcohol.comment: For beer, wine and liquors used in cooking or baking.

category-deli.name: Deli
category-deli.comment: Cold cuts (of meat products such as sausage)

category-produce.name: Produce
category-produce.comment: Vegetables and fruits. Could be split into those categories.

category-herbs-spices.name: Herbs and Spices
category-herbs-spices.comment: Dried herbs and spices. Could include salt.

category-dairy.name: Dairy
category-dairy.comment: All milk products like milk, yoghurt, butter. But not cheese.
